ygData.subject: RE: Some praise and a few questions
ygData.msgSnippet: You re a bard, what are you doing standing toe to toe with these things. :-) You might want to see how you do with just instruments and compare. As for those
ygData.messageBody:
You're a bard, what are you doing standing toe to toe with these things. :-)

You might want to see how you do with just instruments and compare.

As for those close battles, get on your horse and finish him off with
selo's/bellow. Hymn and jig at your own discretion.

You also didn't mention what level you are. :-)

---Windleaf

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Peck White [mailto:peck_white@...]
> Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 10:49 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Some praise and a few questions
>
>
> From: Peck White <peck_white@...>
>
> I tried soloing a gargoyle Wednesday night. I was
> using a Silvery War Axe primary and a Dragoon Dirk
> secondary. I was induced to take a dirt nap. It was
> close though. I think if I had've gotten some lucky
> rolls on the melee I would've won. At level 20, I
> don't think you would stand a chance.
>
> Tomerrilin
> Mith Marr
>
> --- TommyC <uber_sorcerer@...> wrote:
> > 2. My other toon is a mage(20th Level) and he is
> > now in OOT soloing gargoyles. Can I do the same with
> > my bard or will the gargoyles rip me a new one?
>
